channel.title: Arduino on Dave's Hacks
channel.description: Recent content in Arduino on Dave's Hacks

item.title: Arduino and Shifts
item.description: After thinking about getting an Arduino for a while, I finally got around to getting one from oomlout. I purchased the budget pack, so it came with the Arduino, various length wires, LEDs, resistors, a couple of switches, two potentiometers and a photo resistor. So in all enough to get me started. I thought it was a nice touch that it came with a protoboard and plastic base to screw the arduino and the protoboard on.
